content: a new little chicken accent for all my chicken loving friends these super cute pierogi shaped chickens work up super quick and are versatile add a jute twine hanger to the center top to create an ornament a magnet on the back for a chicken for your fridge a key ring or whatever you like to show off your creation feel free to use any ww4/aran/10ply yarn you like to create these little friends finished chicken should measure approx 3 tall by 3 25 wide if you have any questions about this pattern or any of the other patterns from regina p designs or want to show off your finished projects with our patterns please join our facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/869715883461437/ check out regina p designs website to find out more get sneak peeks free patterns & sales https //www reginapdesigns com/ ***materials *** red heart super saver aran fleck approx 12 yds total a couple yards of any red orange & black ww4/aran/10ply yarns for accents h 5mm hook scissors needle jute twine magnet or key chain optional ***abbreviations us terms *** skip = skip sts = stitches st = stitch sl= slip_stitch chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet copyright 2023 regina p designs all rights reserved all content copyright and other rights reserved by regina p designs no content may be duplicated without express written consent final if you have a problem with working out parts of a pattern please contact the designer for help
